Name: MOLOCH (Zero)
About the game: Congratulations! We've evaluated your personal information and are happy to invite you to proceed with our 15 minute interview process. Welcome to MOLOCH (Zero), the official interview simulation for MOLOCH Corporation. If you are reading this, you have been selected as a potential candidate for further screening for the position of [shift manager] within MOLOCH Corporation. To continue with this potential venture, please complete the following instructions: 1) Download the MOLOCH OS with the 'play' button provided on this page. 2) Implement the MOLOCH OS by launching the file. 3) Proceed to MOLOCH (Zero) interview simulation software to begin your vetting process. 4) While you have MOLOCH OS implemented, please enjoy a round of our timeless classic game, Lucky Cup. And remember: work hard, work fast, work well.
